name: xmlHasChild
description: Checks if the XML document object has a child node

params.name: xmlObject
params.description: The XML document object to be checked for child nodes

params.name: childName
params.description: The name of the child node to check if it exists. If not provided, the root is checked.

examples.title: Check for children (Script syntax)
examples.description: Checks the existence of children for two separate nodes in a simple XML document
